claim.claim_text: According to the World Bank, life expectancy at birth in Italy was 82.9 years in 2020.

verification.explanation: According to Data Commons, life expectancy at birth in Italy was 82.195 years in 2020.

claim.claim_text: According to Eurostat, life expectancy at birth in Italy was 82.4 years in 2020.

verification.explanation: According to Data Commons, the life expectancy at birth in Italy was 82.195 years in 2020.

claim.claim_text: Italy's national statistics office, Istat, reported that life expectancy fell to 82 years in 2020.

verification.explanation: According to Data Commons, the life expectancy in Italy was 82.1951219512 years in 2020.

claim.claim_text: According to Istat, life expectancy for men in Italy was 79.7 years in 2020.

verification.explanation: According to Data Commons (World Bank data), life expectancy at birth for men in Italy was 80 years in 2020, which differs slightly from the claimed 79.7 years from Istat.

claim.claim_text: According to Istat, life expectancy for women in Italy was 84.4 years in 2020.

verification.explanation: According to Data Commons, the life expectancy for women in Italy was 84.5 years in 2020.
